properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_NICK, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_PROFILE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NM = ?, MEMBER_NICK = ?, MEMBER_TEL = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?,?,?,?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PROFILE = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICK = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO
SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NM = ? AND TO_CHAR(MEMBER_BIRTH,'YYYY-MM-DD') = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
